text: nam avarutaiya pirarttanaiyai ankikarittu (malataka irunta) avarutaiya manaiviyai kunappatutti, yahyavai avarukku(c cantatiyakak) kotuttom. Niccayamaka ivarkal anaivarum nanmaiyana kariyankalaic ceyvatil oruvarai oruvar muntik kontiruntarkal. (Nam arulai) virumpiyum (nam tantanaiyaip) payantum nam'mitam pirarttanai ceytu kontiruntarkal. Ivarkal anaivarum nam'mitam mikka ullaccamutaiyavarkalakavum iruntarkal
